| History                 = The Righteous Ones MC are a biker gang that sent representatives to  gangland summit in NY City which was crashed by [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]].{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 61}} Seeking revenge for their brothers who were slaughtered, members of the gang headed to the town where the Punisher was locked up. Along with members from other gangs, they took out the local Sheriff department. Ending in a confrontation with the Punisher who had been released from the cell, which they lost.{{r|Punisher War Journal Vol 1 63|64}}{{r|Punisher: War Zone Vol 1 25}}
